analyzed: ni la mtshhungs 'od 'bar/_/g.yas kyi zhal ni dud ka ste/_/g.yon pa ma ra ga

analyzed: pam sam kha sa la hu~m nam hu~m swa ha/_om kam kam ko da ka hu~m nam hu~m swa ha/_om am nam ba

analyzed: sreg 'o ma can/_/'o mar bcas pa'i sbyin bsreg bya/_/de lta'i mchod bcas
